entry.title: GitHub CoPilot Samples and Keyboard Shortcuts

link.title: GitHub CoPilot Samples and Keyboard Shortcuts

entry.summary: Github Co-Pilot Shortcut Keys and Samples C# Constants Code from Comments Keyboard Shortcuts Tab Accept suggestion Esc Dismiss suggestion Alt+[or] Cycle through suggestions Alt+,or. Cycle through suggestions (Visual Studio) Ctrl+Alt+\ Trigger Suggestions Ctrl+Alt+Enter Open Copilot Ctrl+Enter Open copilot suggestions

entry.title: Running Docker in a Hyper-V VM

link.title: Running Docker in a Hyper-V VM

entry.summary: PowerShell command to allow Docker to run in a Hyper-V VM Set-VMProcessor -VMName Dev-DOCKER-Win -ExposeVirtualizationExtensions $true

entry.title: VSCode Active Tab Background Color
entry.summary: Change the color of the active tab in VSCode Open settings.json and add the following to the workbench.colorTheme section. "workbench.colorCustomizations": { "tab.activeBackground": "#8d8888" "tab.inactiveBackground": "#ff0000" } Alternative: File –> Preferences –> Settings and search for workbench.colorTheme and select edit in settings.json Add the snippet abo...

entry.title: Bicep Notes
entry.summary: Bicep Notes Links xxx Commands //Sample hello world param yourName string var hello = 'Hello World! - Hi' output helloWorld string = '${hello} ${yourName}' resource container 'Micrososoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers@2020-08-01-preview' = { name: '${stAcc.name}/default/${containerName}' }

entry.title: VSCode Settings
entry.summary: VSCode Shortcuts Ctrl + , Open Settings Ctrl + KS Save All VSCode Settings File > Preferences > Settings and search for term: indent [Workbench > Tree:Indent] set to 20 2.
